page.title: 17LONGWOOD NATURE RESERVE
page.content: This Nature reserve is owned by the{ {Bristol Waterworks Company}but leased to the Somerset Trust For Nature Conservation (STNC). Longwood has a nature trial & many distinctive flowers including wild garlic,bluebells, orchids & tooth wort. It is an important area of deciduous woodland and careful management is restoring its natural vegetation. Foxes, badgers, squirrels & many birds are found in large numbers. Longwood is also distinctive for its caves. A stream flowing through the valley disappears into a swallet leading to a large cave system_ Longwood/August Hole. Another spectacular cave_ the 170 metres deep Rhino Rift_is also found in this valley. Conservation also extends underground_to protect formations.
